lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. October 20, 1921. Former President of Bernard Howard & Co. National Radio Sales Representatives. Board Chairman and CEO of Hillier, Newmark, Wechsler and Howard. Past President of The Falls Country Club, Palm Beach, FL. Prior board member of Fresh Meadow Country Club, Great Neck, NY. Devoted husband to Irma Howard for 73 years. Loving father to Lorrie Gerson, Ellen Berger, Kathy Jacobson, Ned Howard. Father-in-law to Al Gerson, Stuart Rosenbluth, Seymour Berger, Mitchell Jacobson, Debra Howard. Grandfather to Adam Gerson, Joshua Jacobson, Jeffrey Howard. Services are private. 1/3
